title: Bon Appetizers, LLC Recalls Products Due to Misbranding and an Undeclared Allergen
summary: WASHINGTON, March 12, 2015 Bon Appetizers, LLC, a Lakewood, N.J., company, is recalling approximately 10,429 pounds of chicken product due to misbranding and an undeclared allergen, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The product contains peanut, a known...
